name: Kingdom Supercultures
long_description: Kingdom Supercultures creates and sells Superculture® ingredients.  Superculture® ingredients are a new class of postbiotics made from natural microbes that we intentionally design to make a quantifiable impact on unmet consumer health needs and to address these needs at their root.  We're actively selling Superculture® ingredients for oral health and immune health in pets, each with best-in-class clinical efficacy and new marketing claims for our partner brands.
one_liner: Natural functional ingredients that actually work
